item.description:
This is the weekend of the annual South County Balloon Festival. Friday night we can listen to some great music and then watch as the balloons inflate and rise. Later in the evening we can see the balloons glow against the night sky.
Bring your cameras to catch this beautiful event!

6:30 - 8:30pm John Cafferty and the Beaver Brown Band–RAIN 0R SHINE– Main Stage

Last year the band John Cafferty and Beaver Brown played Friday night. It was a great time. We felt a few raindrops during the music...then watched as the balloons slowly deflated to end the evening. So let's hope the weather cooperates this year!

Their website for more information is
http://www.wakefieldr...


Check out some great photos courtesy of another photo meetup group at http://photo.meetup.c...
and http://photo.meetup.c...

group.name: Mingle with singles 45+ Socializing and dancing

item.name: Balloon Festival and Music at URI
